title: Conair BC40JBC Hot Brush, White, 0.75 Inch
description: This 3/4-inch styling brush features a pearlized handle for optimum comfort while styling, plus its anodized aluminum barrel provides top level safety. Its special, ball-tipped bristles help provide greater lift and comfort, for an all around tangle-free styling experience. The brush is fitted with an on/off light and swivel cord, and is UL-listed for guaranteed high-quality manufacturing. It comes with a one year limited manufacturer's warranty.

title: Helen of Troy 1514 Brush Iron, White, 1 1/2 Inches Barrel
description: Helen of Troy Professional Brush Iron features a patented ring system that sets curls quickly. 30 watts. Dual heat settings. 8’ cord. 1 1/2”

title: Coal Tar Shampoo Psoriatrax 8oz 25% Coal Tar Solution - Equivalent to 5% Coal Tar
description:
PsoriaTrax 5% Coal Tar Shampoo 8oz Bottle Maximum strength for controlling the symptoms of Psoriasis and seborrheic dermatitis.

DIRECTIONS: Shake bottle well before each use. Wet your hair and massage PsoriaTrax into hair, scalp and effected areas.Leave in for 3-5 minutes, Rinse and repeat.Use daily until symptoms disappear. Usually 3-5 days.Repeat these directions when symptoms return. NOTE: PsoriaTrax is 5% coal tar. Symptoms should clear quickly and you should remain symptom free for a few weeks before you will need to re-treat your scalp.Your amount of time may vary.
